segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen drawing, taking it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's facing away, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet's still running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the sinkâ€” that's unexpected!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's position on the stool catches me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so stretched out, grabbing those cookies boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him seems perfectly in sync.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets reveal that big cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path looks inviting and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the puddle's growing quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron add to the homely feel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how no one's reacting to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light through the window panes is soft.
segments.speaker: PAR
